name: heatingTemperature_decrease
description: This function is used to lower the heating temperature of a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to lower the heating temperature.

parameters.name: heatingTemperatureDelta
parameters.description: The amount by which to decrease the heating temperature.
